versions.id: Milky Chance - Stolen Dance - Chords + lyrics
versions.name: Chords + lyrics
versions.content:
[INTRO]
G#m    F#  E       B       D#7
e|-------------------------------------|
B|------4-2-2-0-0-0-0-7-7-7-7-4-4-4-4--|
G|----4-4-3-3-1-1-1-1-8-8-8-8-6-6-6-6--|
D|------6-4-4-2-2-2-2-9-9-9-9-5-5-5-5--|
A|---6------------------------6-6-6-6--|
E|--4---4-2-2-0-0-0-0-7-7-9-9----------|
[VERSE]
G#m        F#      E
I want you by my side
B                    D#7
So that I never feel alone again
G#m            F#      E
They've always been so kind
B                           D#7
But now they've brought you away from here
G#m          F#             E
I hope they didn't get your mind
B                        D#7
Your heart is too strong anyway
G#m        F#             E
We need to fetch back the time
B                     D#7
They have stolen from us
[CHORUS]
E 
And I want you
B
We can bring it on the floor
     D#7              G#m
You've never danced like this before
 F#
We don't talk about it
E                  B
Dancin' on, do the boogie all night long
D#7          G#m
Stoned in paradise

E

B
